oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bluegrass Special with Grandpa Jones at Earl's Drive-In
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Grand ole opry (Radio program); Grandpa Jones, 1913-1998;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (black and red on white) announcing the Bluegrass special with Grand Ole Opry stars Grandpa Jones, Ramblin Lou's Family Band, Troy Boswell, Elmer Bird, and Linda Lou at Earl's Drive-In on August 23. Poster features metal photoplates of Grandpa Jones, Troy Boswell, Elmer Bird, and Linda Lou. Poster was printed for job no. 1157. To view the paperwork associated with this poster, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/20691.
